headline: Zebra Technologies to Release Fourth Quarter and Full Year Results on Feb. 12
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., January 15, 2026--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, will report its fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results on Thursday morning, Feb. 12, 2026.

headline: Zebra (ZBRA): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Over the past six months, Zebra’s shares (currently trading at $262.62) have posted a disappointing 17.8% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 11.5% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
